resources.string:
"Press the red button in upper right part of the screen to unlock tethering.\n\n"
"Some mobile carriers make you pay extra for data plans that allow mobile tethering, but " "there's and easy work around. Just by running one shell command you can unlock free data " "tethering. It will still count against your data, but it will not cost you anything extra, " "such as a special data tethering plan. After running the command, just go to your settings " "and you can enable wireless tethering."
